In ages old, when Ancients broke
Azari of the Legion spoke
To tempt the mortals: gems of power
 The weak succumbed, their souls devoured.

The final stone undid its master
Spun into wards by nameless caster
Azari wailed a savage roar
Now sealed in nether, evermore.

text: Battlecry: Give your minions +1 Attack.

name: Champion's Maul
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.

text: Battlecry: Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: Qualifications: Born with pointy hat.

name: Gilded Gargoyle
text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.

name: Gluttonous Trogg
text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain +1/+1.

flavor: Sparkliest of the seven deadly sprites.

text: Hero Power\nSummon a copy of a minion.

text: Hero Power\nReduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).

text: At the start of your turn, attack a random enemy.
flavor: What is best in life? To make candle. To keep candle. To hear lamentations of candle-takers.

text: Hero Power\nFind a Treasure!

text: Destroy 2 of your opponent's Mana Crystals and they discard 2 cards.

name: Purifier's Maul
text: Battlecry: Give your minions Divine Shield.

name: Reckless Flurry
text: Spend all your Armor. Deal that much damage to all minions.
flavor: Look. Cautious Flurries will only get you so far in life.

name: Rummaging Kobold
text: Battlecry: Return one of your destroyed weapons to your hand.
flavor: "Broken longsword is brand new shortsword." - Kobold Proverb

name: Sacred Maul
text: Battlecry: Give your minions Taunt.

name: Sewer Crawler
text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/3_Giant Rat.
flavor: His clothing is "ratty" in more ways than one.

name: Shrieking Shroom
text: At the end of your turn, summon a random\n1-Cost minion.
flavor: Auditioning for the next Fungal Idol.

name: Sonya Shadowdancer
text: After a friendly minion dies, add a 1/1 copy of it to your hand. It costs (1).
flavor: Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like a 1/1 is watching.

name: Starving Crab
text: At the start of your turn, deal 5 damage to your_hero.

text: Divine Shield\n Poisonous

text: Divine Shield, Poisonous

text: Draw a card. Fill your hand with copies of it.

name: Toothy Chest
text: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 4.
flavor: Do you want to eat an adventurer?  I want to eat an adventurer!

name: Twilight Acolyte
text: Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, swap this minion's Attack with another minion's.
flavor: The dragons mostly keep him around as a snack.

name: Twilight's Call
text: Summon 1/1 copies of 2 friendly Deathrattle minions\nthat died this game.
flavor: If you’re experiencing resurrection sickness, press 1.

name: Unidentified Elixir
text: Give a minion +2/+2. Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
flavor: "Here, taste this." (Slurp) "What is it?" "I don't know, I found it in one of the labs."

name: Unidentified Maul
text: Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
flavor: When all you have is an unidentified maul, everything else looks like an unidentified nail.

name: Void Ripper
text: Battlecry: Swap the\nAttack and Health of all_other_minions.
flavor: You had to put the portable hole inside the bag of holding, didn't you?!

text: Silence and destroy all enemy minions.

text: Deathrattle: Resummon this minion.

text: Draw 3 cards. Reduce their Costs to (0).

flavor: Her name seems a bit cheesy.

text: Lifesteal. Deal $5 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)

name: Astral Tiger
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a\n copy of this minion into_your_deck.
flavor: Astral kitty litter is surprisingly hard to find.

name: Branching Paths
text: [x]Choose Twice - Draw a\ncard; Give your minions \n+1 Attack; Gain 6 Armor.
flavor: Three paths diverged in a darkened hall, and I –\nI took the one less traveled by,\nAnd got eaten by a slime.

name: Cataclysm
text: Destroy all minions. Discard your hand.
flavor: RUN FROM SKY CANDLES! THEY BURN! RUN!

name: Cursed Disciple
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/1 Revenant.
flavor: Politer than his brother, the cursing disciple, but far more evil.

name: Darkness Candle
text: Casts When Drawn\nSnuff out a candle.

name: Dr. Boom's Boombox
text: [x]Summon 7 'Boom Bots'.

name: Duskbreaker
text: Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Waking up at the break of dusk is just not as impressive.

name: Ebon Dragonsmith
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random weapon in your hand by (2).
flavor: Having a furnace-mouth is really handy for a blacksmith.

name: Elven Minstrel
text: Combo: Draw 2 minions from your deck.
flavor: "After that gig in Hamlin went south, I swore off rats."

name: Fal'dorei Strider
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your deck. When drawn, summon a 4/4 Spider.
flavor: What’s worse? Seeing the spider, or NOT seeing the spider, but knowing it’s somewhere in your deck?

name: Flanking Strike
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Summon a 3/3 Wolf.
flavor: Wolves to the left and arrows to the right, here I am stuck in the middle with you.

name: Greater Amethyst Spellstone
text: Lifesteal. Deal $7 damage to a minion.

name: Guardian Spirit
text: Taunt

name: Hoarding Dragon
text: Deathrattle: Give your opponent two Coins.
flavor: Keeps his two cents to himself.

name: Hooked Reaver
text: Battlecry: If you have 15 or_less Health, gain +3/+3_and Taunt.
flavor: The hook is just an accessory. He can reave just fine without it.

name: Ironwood Golem
text: Taunt\nCan only attack if you have 3 or more Armor.
flavor: Marketed as a "rust-proof iron golem."

name: Kobold Illusionist
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 copy of a minion from your hand.
flavor: He can make ANYTHING look like a candle.

name: Kobold Monk
text: Your hero can't be targeted by spells or Hero_Powers.
flavor: There is no candle.

name: Lesser Amethyst Spellstone
text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)
flavor:
A purple stone Azari carved
For dark hearts, craving, power-starved.
The first to bow, the warlock Rin,
Embraced the darkness, slew her kin.

name: Leyline Manipulator
text: Battlecry: If you're holding any cards that didn't start in your deck, reduce their Cost by (2).
flavor: The shortest distance between two points is a leyline.

name: Oaken Summons
text: Gain 6 Armor.\nRecruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
flavor: The Guild used oak trees until they all turned to ash.

name: Primordial Wand
text: Adapt a friendly minion {0} |4(time, times).

name: Reverberating Ooze
text: After this minion\nsurvives damage, summon a copy of this minion.

name: Shimmering Courser
text: Only you can target\nthis with spells and\nHero Powers.
flavor: A courser is a courser of course, of course, she's more of a unicorn than a horse...

name: Shroom Brewer
text: Battlecry: Restore #4_Health.
flavor: Side effects guaranteed!

name: Shroomsayer
text: After this minion\nsurvives damage,\ndestroy all minions.

name: Sneaky Devil
text: Stealth\nYour other minions have +1 Attack.
flavor: The result of a tragic accident involving a Defias Thug, a Wand of Polymorph, and a bundle of Fel Lotus.

name: Spider Ambush!
text: Casts When Drawn\nSummon a 4/4 Spider.

name: The Darkness
text: [x]Starts dormant. Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Candles into the enemy deck. When drawn, this awakens.
flavor: I would rather light a single candle than curse the darkness. But I'm willing to do both.

name: Twig of the World Tree
text: Deathrattle: Gain 10 Mana Crystals.
flavor: For druids who want to branch out.

name: Arcane Tyrant
text: Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
flavor: Tyrant is such a strong word.

name: Call to Arms
text: [x]Recruit 3 minions that\n cost (2) or less.
flavor: More personal than a text to arms.

name: Carnivorous Cube
text: Battlecry: Destroy\na friendly minion.\nDeathrattle: Summon 2 copies of it.
flavor: He's always grumpy until he's eaten his first barista of the morning.

name: Corrosive Sludge
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
flavor: The result of centuries of terrible sanitation.

name: Deck of Wonders
text: Shuffle 5 Scrolls into your deck. When drawn, cast a random spell.
flavor: "Pick a card, any card. Wait! No! Not that one!" - Last words of previous owner

name: Dispel Ward
text: Hero Power\nSilence your minions.

name: Doors Are Closing
text: Hero Power\nEnd the game.

name: Dragon's Fury
text: Reveal a spell from your deck. Deal damage equal to its Cost to all_minions.
flavor: “C’mon Hucklemuck. She’ll never notice if we take just one little coin.”

name: Emerald Spellstone
text: Summon three 3/3_Wolves. (Play a Secret to upgrade.)

name: Fungalmancer
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +2/+2.
flavor: Fungalmancy is the easy major for those who can't cut it at Waxmancy.

name: Furbolg Mossbinder
text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a 6/6_Elemental.
flavor: Behold, the unstoppable power of MOSS!

name: Greater Emerald Spellstone
text: Summon four 3/3_Wolves.

name: Greater Onyx Spellstone
text: Destroy up to 3 random enemy minions.

name: Green Jelly
text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/2 Ooze with_Taunt.
flavor: This card really breaks out of the mold.

name: Guild Recruiter
text: Battlecry: Recruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
flavor: The original telemarketer.

name: Ixlid, Fungal Lord
text: After you play a minion, summon a copy of it.
flavor: We suggest crafting Ixlid; he'll grow on you. Literally.

name: King's Ransom
text: Swap decks with your_opponent.

name: Lesser Emerald Spellstone
text: Summon two 3/3_Wolves. (Play a Secret to upgrade.)
flavor:
An emerald stone for Tauren hands
Who sought its strength to save their lands
Their tribes now lost, their rage released
Who’s hunting now? And who’s the beast?

name: Lesser Onyx Spellstone
text: (Play 3 Deathrattle cards to upgrade.)
flavor:
The trolls of old embraced the gift
A jewel of black for daggers swift
No party lasts who finds the stone
Those wielding it soon stand alone.

name: Level Up!
text: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2 and_Taunt.
flavor: Ding!\n\nGrats.

name: Scroll of Wonder
text: Casts When Drawn\nCast a random spell.

name: Skull of the Man'ari
text: At the start of your turn, summon a Demon from your hand.
flavor: Don't trust the skull.

name: The Final Seal
text: [x]Summon a 6/6 Demon.\nAdd 'Azari, the Devourer'\nto your hand.

name: The First Seal
text: Summon a 2/2 Demon. Add 'The Second Seal' to your hand.

name: The Fourth Seal
text: Summon a 5/5 Demon. Add 'The Final Seal'\nto your hand.

name: The Second Seal
text: Summon a 3/3 Demon. Add 'The Third Seal'\nto your hand.

name: The Third Seal
text: Summon a 4/4 Demon. Add 'The Fourth Seal' to your hand.

name: Trogg Gloomeater
text: Taunt\nPoisonous
flavor: His breath smells like agony and despair, which is still better than most troggs.

name: Windshear Stormcaller
text: Battlecry: If you control all 4 basic Totems, summon Al'Akir_the_Windlord.
flavor: Don't ever doubt Al'Akir's love for basic totems.

name: Aluneth
text: At the end of your turn, draw 3 cards.
flavor: PHENOMENAL ARCANE POWER…itty bitty living space.

name: Crystal Lion
text: [x]Divine Shield\nCosts (1) less for each Silver\nHand Recruit you control.
flavor: Standard issue recruit gear: 1 silver sword, 1 Lordaeron insignia, 2 bags of crystal kibble.

name: Gather Your Party
text: Recruit a minion.
flavor: Thrilling adventure! Danger guaranteed! Loot uncertain! Death optional!  Who’s with me?

name: Gemstudded Golem
text: Taunt\nCan only attack if you have 5 or more Armor.
flavor: Perfectly accessorized to attract adventurers.

name: Grumble, Worldshaker
text: Battlecry: Return your other minions to your hand. They cost (1).
flavor: The grumbling grew to a mighty rumbling, and out of the caverns the kobolds came tumbling.

name: Guardian Spirit
text: Taunt

name: Hungry Ettin
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Summon a random 2-Cost minion for your opponent.
flavor: How can he be hungry… if he's Ettin!?

name: Possessed Lackey
text: Deathrattle: Recruit a_Demon.
flavor: If you don't keep up with your payments, it'll be a repossessed lackey.

name: Rin, the First Disciple
text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Add 'The First Seal' to your hand.
flavor: Signed and sealed, she delivers oblivion.

name: Runed Shield
text: Gain 5 Armor.\nSummon a 5/5 Golem.

name: Seeping Oozeling
text: Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattle of a random minion in your deck.
flavor: Uh, you might want to get that looked at.

name: Serrated Shield
text: Gain 5 Armor.\nDeal $5 damage.

name: Spiked Shield
text: Gain 5 Armor.\nEquip a 5/2 weapon.

name: To My Side!
text: [x]Summon an Animal\nCompanion, or 2 if your\ndeck has no minions.
flavor: I hunt alone.  Well, me and Misha.  And Huffer.  And Leokk.

name: Tower Shield +10
text: Gain 5 Armor.\nGain 10 more Armor.

name: Unidentified Shield
text: Gain 5 Armor.\nGains a bonus effect in_your hand.
flavor: The kobold stared at the bundle for a long time. “Ah hah!” he said. “It’s a shield.”

name: Val'anyr
text: Deathrattle: Give a minion in your hand +4/+2. When it dies, reequip this.
flavor: Recently unearthed in one of the deepest kobold caves. Traded for a large candle.

name: Corridor Creeper
text: Costs (1) less whenever a minion dies while this is_in_your hand.
flavor: It likes the smell of dead things, which is curious, as it has no visible nose.

name: Crushing Walls
text: Destroy your opponent's left and right-most minions.
flavor: "It could be worse!" "It's worse."

name: Greater Diamond Spellstone
text: Resurrect 4 different friendly minions.

name: Greater Mithril Spellstone
text: Summon three 5/5 Mithril Golems.

name: Greater Sapphire Spellstone
text: Summon 3 copies of a friendly minion.

name: Lesser Diamond Spellstone
text: (Cast 4 spells to upgrade.)
flavor:
A diamond, white, this stone the eighth
A precious jewel for those of faith
A whispered prayer restores the lost
But none among them know the cost.

name: Lesser Mithril Spellstone
text: Summon one 5/5 Mithril Golem. (Equip a weapon to upgrade.)
flavor:
To dwarves of stone the demon called
With promises of might, enthralled
In grasping greed they found their doom
Forever bound in mithril tombs.

name: Lesser Sapphire Spellstone
text: (Overload 3 Mana Crystals to upgrade.)
flavor:
A stone of blue, embraced with glee
By murloc lords beneath the sea
Soon numberless they swarmed the shore
First two, then four, then more...and more...

name: Lynessa Sunsorrow
text: [x]Battlecry: Cast each spell\nyou cast on your minions\n this game on this one.
flavor: A diet of pure magic is great for the complexion but wreaks havoc on one's mood.

name: Mithril Spellstone
text: Summon two 5/5 Mithril Golems. (Equip a weapon to upgrade.)

name: Psychic Scream
text: Shuffle all minions into your opponent's deck.
flavor: Everybody! Hit the deck!

name: Rhok'delar
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no minions, fill your_hand with Hunter_spells.
flavor: Rhok'delar is ready to Rhok'de'casbah!

name: Shifting Hourglass
text: [x]Take an extra turn. Costs (1) less for each Boss you've defeated this run.

name: Silver Vanguard
text: Deathrattle: Recruit an\n8-Cost minion.
flavor: Float like a Faerie Dragon, sting like a Hivequeen.

name: Spiteful Summoner
text: [x]Battlecry: Reveal a spell from your deck. Summon a random minion with the same Cost.
flavor: Sometimes she'll summon a Doomsayer. Out of spite.

name: Temporus
text: Battlecry: Your opponent takes two turns. Then you take two turns.
flavor: Follows adventurers, seeking the ultimate time magic: the ability to reload.

name: Geosculptor Yip
text: At the end of your turn, summon a random minion with_Cost_equal_to_your Armor (up to 10).
flavor: Once crafted a gauntlet out of earwax and pure ambition.

name: Grand Archivist
text: At the end of your turn, cast a spell from your deck (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: Qualifications: Found pointy hat.

name: Grizzled Guardian
text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Recruit 2_minions that cost (4)_or_less.
flavor: Favorite sandwich? Grizzled cheese.

name: Kathrena Winterwisp
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Recruit a Beast.
flavor: She’s not one of those treehugger elves – but she does like the occasional cuddle.

name: King Togwaggle
text: [x]Battlecry: Swap decks with your opponent. Give them a Ransom spell to swap back.
flavor: Management of the Kobold Empire requires a careful balance between a lack of social services and fiscal irresponsibility.

name: Marin the Fox
text: Battlecry: Summon a 0/8 Treasure Chest for your opponent. (Break it for awesome loot!)
flavor: My name is Marin the Fox. You took my treasure. Prepare to die.
howToGet: Unlocked by opening a Kobolds & Catacombs pack.
howToGetGold: Unlocked with the BlizzCon 2017 virtual ticket.

name: The Runespear
text: After your hero attacks, Discover a spell\nand cast it with random targets.
flavor: When asked what the runes do, the tauren smith smiled: "A little of this, a little of that..."

name: Violet Wurm
text: Deathrattle: Summon seven 1/1 Grubs.
flavor: It's wurms all the way down.

name: Woecleaver
text: After your hero attacks, Recruit a minion.
flavor: Turn that frown into TWO frowns!

name: Dragoncaller Alanna
text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Dragon for each spell you cast this game that costs (5) or more.
flavor: Her secret is using a gentle voice and carrying a baggie of hotdogs.

name: Dragonhatcher
text: At the end of your turn, Recruit a Dragon.
flavor: Which came first?  The dragon or the dragonhatcher?

name: Master Oakheart
text: Battlecry: Recruit a 1, 2, and 3-Attack minion.
flavor: His adventuring party consists of Goldshire Footman, Frostwolf Grunt and Hadronox.

name: Sleepy Dragon
text: Taunt
flavor: Local villagers call her "Naps Under the Mountain."

name: Voidlord
text: [x]Taunt\n Deathrattle: Summon three\n1/3 Demons with Taunt.
flavor: Never let it hold your checkbook.

name: Azari, the Devourer
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's deck.

name: Rod of Roasting
text: Cast 'Pyroblast' randomly until a_hero_dies.

name: Stolen Time
text: Hero Power\nDestroy 3 of your Mana_Crystals.\nTake an extra turn.

name: Wish
text: Fill your board with Legendary minions. Fully heal your hero.
